definition[0]: a feeling of being annoyed or upset, especially because someone has ignored you or insulted you
example[0]: He stormed out in a fit of pique.
definition[1]: a type of material made of cotton, silk, or rayon
definition[2]: to make someone feel annoyed or upset, especially by ignoring them or making them look stupid
example[1]: Privately, Zarich was piqued that his offer was rejected.
explanation[0]: Pique is usually passive in this meaning
